title: Luna and Sol
description: As the chief’s daughter, Luna has a duty to her people to marry who her father chooses and to produce a male heir for her tribe. The problem is, she’s fallen in love with her father’s enemy.Sol, the rival tribe’s warrior is captivated by the dark-eyed beauty, the one person he can’t have. She makes him want to break all the rules he has vowed to uphold, to taste the forbidden.Life brings Luna and Sol together.Two people meant to stay apart.Their forbidden romance could bring war to their people — but how can they choose between true love and loyalty to their family?Luna and Sol is a beautiful love story that will keep you turning the page. If you like strong female characters and secret romance that will sweep you away from your reality, then you’ll love this book.Buy now to start reading this unique romance novel today!***HEA guaranteed. No cheating. ***
author: A.M. Kusi
